mapper.update:
update t_com_dealer
companyid = #{companyid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
operatorid = #{operatorid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
privilege = #{privilege,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
nick = #{nick,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_com_dealer set parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, privilege = #{privilege,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
